mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID memberId ,MEMBER_EMAIL memberEmail ,MEMBER_NICKNAME memberNickname ,MEMBER_NAME memberName ,MEMBER_SEX memberSex ,MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME memberProfileName ,MEMBER_STYLE_1 memberStyle1 ,MEMBER_STYLE_2 memberStyle2 ,MEMBER_STYLE_3 memberStyle3 ,MEMBER_STYLE_4 memberStyle4 ,MEMBER_STYLE_5 memberStyle5 FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{memberPassword}

SELECT MEMBER_ID ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_SEX ,MEMBER_REGIST_DATE ,MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME ,MEMBER_STYLE_1 ,MEMBER_STYLE_2 ,MEMBER_STYLE_3 ,MEMBER_STYLE_4 ,MEMBER_STYLE_5 FROM MEMBER WHERE SESSION_KEY = #{sessionId} AND SESSION_LIMIT > SYSDATE+9/24
